name: Side painting
description:
A short puzzlescript game about painting the sides of blocks making that painted side  different when it's interacted with.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=b697820c8e40c1f325de09e501d348fa

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b697820c8e40c1f325de09e501d348fa

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
